snippet: Following are excerpts from comments today by Senator Orrin G. Hatch in a meeting of the Senate Judiciary Committee explaining why he opposes the nomination of Bill Lann Lee as Assistant Attorney General for Civil Rights, and from the White House ...
lead_paragraph: Following are excerpts from comments today by Senator Orrin G. Hatch in a meeting of the Senate Judiciary Committee explaining why he opposes the nomination of Bill Lann Lee as Assistant Attorney General for Civil Rights, and from the White House response to criticisms of his record: MR. HATCH On California's Referendum Mr. Lee has devoted much of his career to the relentless pursuit of constitutionally suspect racial and gender preference policies.
abstract: Excerpts from comments by Sen Orrin Hatch explaining his opposition to nomination of Bill Lann Lee as assistant attorney general for civil rights, and from White House response with regard to Lee's defense of affirmative action programs (S)
